jobDescription: Business Centric Technology, a technical staffing company with the single focus of pairing the right candidate with the right employment opportunity is currently searching for a Data/Systems Lead Business Analyst for a contract opportunity in the DFW area. Instructs, directs and communicates with the team to ensure deadlines are met. Assists manager with staff development and quality assurance standards as needed.
